vote.title: Authorize a professional services contract with Urban Engineers Group, Inc. for schematic design, design development, construction documents, procurement and construction observation phases for renovations at Kidd Springs Park Japanese Garden located at 700 West Canty Street - Not to exceed $98,400.00 - Financing: Park and Recreation Facilities (B) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Fund)
